itunes:title: Fake News 174 - Desperation in Pennsylvania
title: Fake News 174 - Desperation in Pennsylvania
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
description:
The Senate race in Pennsylvania between John Fetterman and Dr. Oz is getting desperate after Fetterman's debate disaster, Taylor Swift is in trouble on the internet for being fatphobic in her latest music video, Meta's stock is in the toilet, and Hollywood has extended its COVID protocols.
